title: MadMan
body:
MadMan

Company: Nethersoft Interactive
Language: ENG
Original Size: 1.7 GB
Repack Size: 1.1/1.2 GB

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on MadMan-TiNYiSO ISO release: tn-madman.iso (1,823,385,600 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of animated menu background video
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 1.7 to 1.1/1.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 1.7 GB
  • Repack uses compression library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Trapped inside an abandoned mental asylum with a psychopathic killer lurking about, you are forced to explore the facility armed with only your wits to survive. With a blood hungry madman on your trail you are never safe, every move could be your last. Will you escape to tell the tale or become another victim?

Synopsis:
You find yourself lost inside a creepy abandoned asylum, you have no form of self defense and must find your way through the asylum while being hunted by a brutal serial killer. Once a former doctor at the facility now a blood hungry madman, he will stop at nothing to get his hands on you. Use your wits to outsmart the doctor or hide and pray he doesn’t find you. MadMan is a first person indie horror game built for tension.

MadMan is a true survival horror experience, you are no combat veteran and must avoid the horrors that lurk about to survive.

Game Features

  • Run and Hide: combat is no skill of yours, you can only avoid the horror that lurks within by running / hiding
  • Realistic Graphics: AAA graphics to produce the ultimate horror atmospheric experience
  • Sound based gameplay: Use the sound of footsteps to interpret the doctor’s whereabouts, or perhaps make noise to distract him to reach your goal
  • Game Length: MadMan is made by a solo developer and on a small budget, because of this the game will be short and can be beaten within 1 hour.
  • Warning: MadMan contains intense gore and violence, do enjoy yourself.
